text: Kanti ke xa umntu echukunyiswa bubuhlungu, uye athandaze eNkosini yakhe, abuyele kuYo ngenguquko: Kodwa Esakumbonelela ngezibele zaKhe, alibale ngoko ebekuthandazele ngaphambili, aze abe nabaphikisi baka Allâh khona ukuze baphambukise abanye abantu eNdleleni yaKhe. Yithi: “Kuvuyeleni ukungakholwa kwenu okwethutyana: inene nina ningabanye babo bangabahlali baseMlilweni!”
